byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Through the deal, Mattel will add Thomas the Tank Engine and Bob the Builder to its already robust stable of toy brands.
snippet: Through the deal, Mattel will add Thomas the Tank Engine and Bob the Builder to its already robust stable of toy brands.
lead_paragraph: Thomas the Tank Engine is about to make some new friends.

headline.main: Mattel to Acquire HIT Entertainment for $680 Million
